title: Poster, ""Fall 1985" poster for Columbia School of Architecture lecture series", ca. 1985
description: Poster shows text in white, lower center: Columbia University / Graduate School of Architecture / Planning and Preservation; left: Wednesday / Lecture / Series. The poster lists the schedule of the lecture series along with names of lecturers in black, white, and gray.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, ""Fall 1985" poster for Columbia School of Architecture lecture series", ca. 1985.
ca. 1985. Offset lithograph. Gift of Willi Kunz. 1996-87-20.
